nodes.text: Beramsh was a doctor who led the first surveys of Tandun III.

In 12,293 BBY, Dr. Beramsh led an expedition from Ord Mantell to Tandun III. Beramsh supervised the exploration of the planet and found massive ancient population centers the doctor theorized were constructed by the Rakata. Though Dr. Beramsh's survey had proven that Tandun III was suitable for colonization, it was never colonized before its destruction in 43 ABY.
